narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Corecare Behavioral Health Management Inc. is a Substance Abuse Rehabilitation Facility provider based in Philadelphia, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $73.2M in Medicaid payments across 283K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $73.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
